description.value: This NamingSytem defines an identifier system to identify healthcare organizations' physical locations. The identifier value is equal to the HCOrganization.Site.SiteID (or site number) value as found in the [Common Base Registry for HealthCare Actor (CoBRHA)](https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/ehealthplatform/nl/service-cobrha-common-base-registry-for-healthcare-actor).

usage.value: To identify the location or site of a healthcare organization. The identifier value is equal to the SiteID value in the Common Base Registry for HealthCare Actor (CoBRHA).
